**How can I change my question in the CTA?**  
To change a CTA, you must delete the CTA and create a new one.

**I'd like to send out a CTA only for my new Volunteers**  
A soon-to-be implemented Filter feature will enable you to send out a CTA for Volunteers added between 2 dates.
